bastion_subdomain: <Subdomain for ssh tunnel server route53 record>
prefix: <Name of the deployment in case of multiple parallel deploys>
SLACK_HOOK_URL: <URL to slack hook for event reporting>
bastion_ec2_host_private_key: <Host key to set on ssh tunnel server>
bastion_ec2_user_public_key: <Public key for ssh tunnel server superuser>
bastion_ec2_tunnel_public_keys: <Public key to access ssh tunnel to database>
<Another public key to access ssh tunnel to database>
